fields.description: Hi All, Please see below: {code} $ euca-version euca2ools 3.0.0-alpha4-14-g150208c (Sparta) eucalyptus 3.3.0 {code} This command returns no output {code} $ euca-describe-instances verbose {code} Output with --debug {code} euca-describe-instances verbose --debug 2013-03-22 02:01:56,490 DEBUG DescribeInstances parsed arguments: {'userregion': None, 'filters': None, 'InstanceId': ['verbose'], 'shell_configfile': '', 'deprecated_sec_key': None, 'deprecated_key_id': None, 'url': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None} 2013-03-22 02:01:56,491 INFO DescribeInstances parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeInstances', 'Version': '2013-02-01', 'InstanceId.1': 'verbose'} 2013-03-22 02:01:56,491 INFO Eucalyptus sending request (attempt 1 of 5) 2013-03-22 02:01:56,492 DEBUG Eucalyptus.EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.104.1.150:8773\n/services/Eucalyptus\nAWSAccessKeyId=T28RFIWM39ZQQR3W5IVVO&Action=DescribeInstances&InstanceId.1=verbose&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-03-22T09%3A01%3A56Z&Version=2013-02-01' 2013-03-22 02:01:56,492 DEBUG Eucalyptus.EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: 5FiLA9no0T/gHb3TzG8FXCtb/7PUbARNmqZPM7GPSK4= 2013-03-22 02:01:56,492 DEBUG Eucalyptus.EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data 2013-03-22 02:01:56,501 DEBUG Eucalyptus request method: POST 2013-03-22 02:01:56,501 DEBUG Eucalyptus request url: http://10.104.1.150:8773/services/Eucalyptus 2013-03-22 02:01:56,501 DEBUG Eucalyptus request header: Connection: close 2013-03-22 02:01:56,502 DEBUG Eucalyptus request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded 2013-03-22 02:01:56,502 DEBUG Eucalyptus request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.0.0-alpha4-14-g150208c (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-279.22.1.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.1.0-alpha4 requests/0.14.1 2013-03-22 02:01:56,502 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: AWSAccessKeyId: T28RFIWM39ZQQR3W5IVVO 2013-03-22 02:01:56,502 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: Action: DescribeInstances 2013-03-22 02:01:56,502 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: InstanceId.1: verbose 2013-03-22 02:01:56,502 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: Signature: 5FiLA9no0T/gHb3TzG8FXCtb/7PUbARNmqZPM7GPSK4= 2013-03-22 02:01:56,502 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256 2013-03-22 02:01:56,502 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: SignatureVersion: 2 2013-03-22 02:01:56,502 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: Timestamp: 2013-03-22T09:01:56Z 2013-03-22 02:01:56,502 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: Version: 2013-02-01 2013-03-22 02:01:56,765 DEBUG Eucalyptus response time: 0.271 seconds 2013-03-22 02:01:56,765 INFO Eucalyptus response status: 200 2013-03-22 02:01:56,765 DEBUG Eucalyptus response header: content-length: 121 2013-03-22 02:01:56,765 DEBUG Eucalyptus response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 2013-03-22 02:01:56,765 DEBUG DescribeInstances -- response content -- 2013-03-22 02:01:56,766 DEBUG DescribeInstances -- end of response content -- {code} Now, running this with an instance ID, which is actually running but CLC thinks it is pending {code} euca-describe-instances i-A9094249 --debug 2013-03-22 02:02:32,407 DEBUG DescribeInstances parsed arguments: {'userregion': None, 'filters': None, 'InstanceId': ['i-A9094249'], 'shell_configfile': '', 'deprecated_sec_key': None, 'deprecated_key_id': None, 'url': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None} 2013-03-22 02:02:32,407 INFO DescribeInstances parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeInstances', 'Version': '2013-02-01', 'InstanceId.1': 'i-A9094249'} 2013-03-22 02:02:32,407 INFO Eucalyptus sending request (attempt 1 of 5) 2013-03-22 02:02:32,408 DEBUG Eucalyptus.EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.104.1.150:8773\n/services/Eucalyptus\nAWSAccessKeyId=T28RFIWM39ZQQR3W5IVVO&Action=DescribeInstances&InstanceId.1=i-A9094249&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-03-22T09%3A02%3A32Z&Version=2013-02-01' 2013-03-22 02:02:32,409 DEBUG Eucalyptus.EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: quslio84GvBoX7uAbhYQjAgU5CLtGw3V5ubsW8zYuso= 2013-03-22 02:02:32,409 DEBUG Eucalyptus.EC2CompatibleQuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data 2013-03-22 02:02:32,415 DEBUG Eucalyptus request method: POST 2013-03-22 02:02:32,415 DEBUG Eucalyptus request url: http://10.104.1.150:8773/services/Eucalyptus 2013-03-22 02:02:32,416 DEBUG Eucalyptus request header: Connection: close 2013-03-22 02:02:32,416 DEBUG Eucalyptus request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded 2013-03-22 02:02:32,416 DEBUG Eucalyptus request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.0.0-alpha4-14-g150208c (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-279.22.1.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.1.0-alpha4 requests/0.14.1 2013-03-22 02:02:32,416 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: AWSAccessKeyId: T28RFIWM39ZQQR3W5IVVO 2013-03-22 02:02:32,416 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: Action: DescribeInstances 2013-03-22 02:02:32,416 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: InstanceId.1: i-A9094249 2013-03-22 02:02:32,416 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: Signature: quslio84GvBoX7uAbhYQjAgU5CLtGw3V5ubsW8zYuso= 2013-03-22 02:02:32,416 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256 2013-03-22 02:02:32,416 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: SignatureVersion: 2 2013-03-22 02:02:32,416 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: Timestamp: 2013-03-22T09:02:32Z 2013-03-22 02:02:32,416 DEBUG Eucalyptus request data: Version: 2013-02-01 2013-03-22 02:02:32,519 DEBUG Eucalyptus response time: 0.110 seconds 2013-03-22 02:02:32,519 INFO Eucalyptus response status: 200 2013-03-22 02:02:32,520 DEBUG Eucalyptus response header: content-length: 1112 2013-03-22 02:02:32,520 DEBUG Eucalyptus response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 2013-03-22 02:02:32,520 DEBUG DescribeInstances -- response content -- r-51A24243980294115009defaulti-A9094249emi-8B2B40FB0pending192.168.45.23410.104.3.60NORMAL: -- []sshlogin0m1.large2013-03-22T07:08:33.113Zcloud33eki-37D13B0Feri-D4CA3864disabled192.168.45.23410.104.3.60instance-store/dev/sda1 2013-03-22 02:02:32,521 DEBUG DescribeInstances -- end of response content -- RESERVATION r-51A24243 980294115009 default INSTANCE i-A9094249 emi-8B2B40FB 10.104.3.60 192.168.45.234 pending sshlogin 0 m1.large 2013-03-22T07:08:33.113Z cloud33 eki-37D13B0F eri-D4CA3864 monitoring-disabled 10.104.3.60 192.168.45.234 instance-store {code} Whats going on? There are 2 things, first a "running" instance is known to CLC as "pending" and second euca2ools is not showing anything in euca-describe-instances or euca-describe-instances verbose, only when specified the instance ID, it shows the output. Please let me know if there are any questions. Cheers! Deependra
fields.summary: DescribeInstances without instance-ID does not give any output

comments.body:
Thinking its an issue with CLC, tried this AWS JAVA SDK 1.3.26 , here is the wiredump on CLC

{code}
####
T 10.104.1.168:45754 -> 10.104.1.150:8773 [AP]
POST /services/Eucalyptus/ HTTP/1.1 
Host: 10.104.1.150:8773 
User-Agent: aws-sdk-java/1.3.26 Linux/2.6.32-279.14.1.el6.x86_64 OpenJDK_64-Bit_Server_VM/20.0-b12 
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8 
Content-Length: 226 
Connection: Keep-Alive 
 
Action=DescribeInstances&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&AWSAccessKeyId=T28RFIWM39ZQQR3W5IVVO&SignatureVersion=2&Version=2012-10-01&Signature=t9dYtx7f9UQxiSlhMqEdii%2F%2BJ1ni9ATeUEbLn6exLVk%3D&Timestamp=2013-03-22T10%3A22%3A16.512Z
##
{code}

The response

{code}
#
T 10.104.1.150:8773 -> 10.104.1.168:45754 [AP]
HTTP/1.1 200 OK 
Content-Length: 121 
Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 
 
<DescribeInstancesResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2012-10-01/"><reservationSet/></DescribeInstancesResponse>
#####
{code}

Hope it helps.
Stopped CLC/Walrus/SC, CC and NC services, removed postgres DB, initialize again, register components again, now can see, output in euca-describe-instances, not sure if the DB was corrupt.
Indeed.  The tool listed every instance it received from the CLC (namely none).  If you can reproduce this then it sounds like you may have found a CLC bug.
Agreed, I am good for now but will keep an eye on this, thanks again for reaching out on this one.
This looks like a CLC bug; moving to the EUCA project...

Thanks [~gholms] , its good to see [~pyara] ending up in this land.

[~pyara] ( regarding: TOOLS-287 ) , is there a way you can share the copy of DB on your system plus the /var/log/eucalyptus/ from the CLC , inside this ticket? I am sure the DB is not in a correct state but the [~clc-team] developers could get benefited with the same, in finding the root cause.

Cheers!
Deependra

Nope, no DB copy available, I've done a clean install to overcome this issue.

[TOOLS 287|https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/browse/TOOLS-287] has a screenshot of eucalyptus_cloud table, which shows the instance in pending state.

[~pyara] and [~dshekhawat], in order to help engineering progress on this one, we need to keep a system in this state when it occurs and escalate it to QA and Engineering.

The next time you see this, please keep the cloud in this state and provide us an update as to as much information as to what you were doing at the time. We've marked it with a high priority but need more information to help understand what is the root cause here.

Thanks
This is fixed in 4.0 with the removal of the terminated instance cache (EUCA-8769)
[~sjones] is there a way to reproduce/test this?

The issue relates to terminated instances being present in the database as well as in the terminated instances cache. The terminated instances cache and the associated special case handling in describe instances are removed in 4.0. You can verify that terminated instances being present in the database no longer cause an issue (this is now the expected behaviour for terminated instances)
